title: Is Python Beginner Friendly?
summary:
Python is increasingly used as a teaching language for new programmers
and touted as an easy language to learn for experienced developers. Its
self proclaimed virtues of beauty, explicitness, simplicity and
readability certainly should make it newbie and user-friendly... and
mostly do. I'd like to talk with other Pythonistas about the parts that
suck and what we can do to fix them!
